question: Who was awarded 2019 Karmaveer Chakra by iCONGO and United Nations?
explanation: 2019 Gold-Medalist from Indian Institute of Technology Roorkee (IIT-R) & founder of International Changemaker Olympiad Rahul Adhikari, was conferred with 2019 Karmaveer Chakra Award REX Karmaveer Global Fellowship at the REX CONCLiVE held in Noida, Uttar Pradesh.Â  The award was given for his contribution in the education sector.
